text: Vidklykannya shcho vy kynulysya (piznishe psuyetʹsya), zvertayuchy niyaku uvahu budʹ khto, navitʹ koly kur'yer zaklykav zzadu vas. Otzhe, Vin zaminyv odne neshchastya dlya inshykh, shcho vas ne mozhete sumuvaty nad budʹ shcho vy promakhnulysya, abo ahonyzuyete nad budʹ-yakymy neharazdamy vy postrazhdaly. BOH Cognizant vse vy
